title: Dmitry Mind
subtitle: About me
text: Designer, developer, enterprenuer and freelancer. Here are collected my pet projects, articles and thoughts for the last 5 years.

title: Data Driven Blog
subtitle: By dev and design
text: DD Blog is an open source blog engine, built with VueJS and Bootstrap. Feel free to use or change it for your own needs üòé

title: Why to use DD Blog?
subtitle: Reasons
text: Easy way to present your things in one place, using just title, subtitle, few lines of text and links. Get your own high performance and single page app from pure data in minimal design.

title: Requirements
subtitle: Requirements
text: All you need to get started is text editor and hosting to upload files. For advanced customization and adding features, VueJS knowledge is required.

title: Data Format
text: All posts data is stored at JSON file, everything you see here is generated from that data. For more details please check docs.

title: Post Sorting
text: All post are sorted by tags, top navigation on the left side generated automatically from the JSON data.

title: Planned Features
subtitle: Message to the future
text: Lists view. Images. Line spacing element. WYSIWYG text editor and option to connect DB.

title: Card with Photo
subtitle: Example
text: Every post is built of title, subtitle, photo, icon, text and and link. You can combine these things as you need.

title: Space Ranger
subtitle: Hyper Casual Game
text: Simplified sea battle gameplay mechanic from the perspective of hyper casual gaming.

title: SEX = Services & EXtensions
subtitle: Abreviatures are funny, no?)
text: Here I placed all of my mini services, browser web extensions and single page apps.

title: Quick 'A' - Tabs Switch
subtitle: Chrome Extension
text: Are you familiar with MacOs Spotlight search or Ctrl+Tab on Windows? Quick A brings a similar UX to your Chrome browser.

title: Stop User Discrimination
subtitle: Article, 5 min read
text: Imagine the feeling of vegetarian that comes to the restaurant and there is a special vegetarian menu. This is how feels a person that can personalize his user experience in your app or service.

title: FreeHand SVG Draw
subtitle: Single Page App
text: Draw vector SVG paths with mouse or fingers. Made with VueJS.

title: Nirvana Game of Life
subtitle: Indie Game
text: The indie game made with friends, that reached more than a million downloads and loved by players overall world.

title: How we used Facebook ads to choose a game design style
subtitle: Article, 2 min read
text: We make the game for players, so we decided to let them choose design  by running real AB test on Facebook ads and checking which banner will get more clicks.

title: Diary Wheel
subtitle: Single Page App
text: Wheel of Diary - Online Service that will document most boring moments of your life!

title: Mr. Number Predictor

title: TrollsoleJS

title: Magic Dust

text: Magic Dust is pure html solution for particles based effects. The main benefits of plugin is easy to use, high performance, responsive and lightweight, just 3.1KB.

title: STARSHINE
subtitle: JS Plugin
text: Generates blinking stars with 6 customizable parameters. Add shiny, sexy or cartoon lights to any HTML element.
